name: 4'-diphenylmethane diisocyanate
hexamethylene diisocyanate homopolymer (CAS Reg. No. 28182-81-2) and hexamethylene diisocyanate
FoodContactSubstance:
Polyester-polyurethane adhesive formulated from the following:
  1. Polyurethane component prepared from allophanate-modified methane diphenyl diisocyanate, 4,4'-diphenylmethane diisocyanate (CAS Reg. No. 101-68-8), propylene oxide, ethylene oxide, 1,2-propanediol, hexamethylene diisocyanate homopolymer (CAS Reg. No. 28182-81-2) and hexamethylene diisocyanate (CAS Reg. No. 822-06-0) and
  2. Polyester/polyol component, prepared from adipic acid, diethylene glycol, methyloxirane polymer, and 1,1,1-tris(hydroxymethyl)propane.
